title: How to summarise a book - Quora

response.answer_text: One of the major pointers you need to keep in mind while writing a summary revolves around putting the events in a sequential order and make sure that they are relevant information only. You can also make notes of the major and important events while reading the book, it’ll make it easier for you to write a summary for the same.
You need to look at the plot you have for the book and write a paragraph out of it. Don’t worry about making it too long, you just need a full paragraph that shortens the plot, explaining everything.
